resources.string: Is it that time of the month again?
Need help urgently within your close proximity?
Want to seek or help people around you in times of need?

Tap on the SOS button to send an SOS message to the last 5 Aphrodite users, you came in contact with. \nWait for someone to respond, talk to this secret angel and request for a sanitary napkin. Once your request has been granted, acknowledge their service and be grateful to them.
PS: This app was built in good faith to help women in times of need. Please be a responsible human and use it wisely.
